name: HEHEHE
description: Reprogram a trap using a Datajack.

name: IT_WAS_AN_ACCIDENT_I_SWEAR
displayName: It Was An Accident, I Swear

name: PARTTIME_EXCAVATOR
description: Use a melee weapon to dig through 10 walls or earth.

name: HEY_THATS_MINE
description: Attack 5 Recyclers attempting to collect parts.

name: MAYBE_NEXT_TIME_ILL_DETACH_MY_LAUNCHER
displayName: Maybe Next Time I'll Detach My Launcher

name: SHORTTERM_SACRIFICES
description: Escape a Stasis Trap with help from an explosion.

name: PLEASE_FORM_A_LINE
description: Hit 2 robots with a single projectile.

name: QUICK_AND_DIRTY
description: Destroy 5 hostiles via explosions in a single turn.

name: BATTER_UP
description: Knock a hostile robot into an exploding machine via melee impact damage.

name: WATCH_THIS
description: Sneak attack a Watcher and destroy it in one hit.

name: DEADLY_FORCE
description: Melee attack a hostile using 4 momentum.

name: AMBIDEXTROUS
description: Destroy 2 hostiles with one melee volley.

name: NO_EXPLOSION_FOR_YOU
description: Shoot down a launcher projectile with a defensive utility.

name: OH_NO_YOU_DONT
description: Destroy a Saboteur before it succeeds.

name: RIDE_THE_LIGHTNING
description: Use a Fabricator to destroy an enemy.

name: UNINVITED_GUEST
description: Be spotted by an Operator that then summons reinforcements from its Terminal.

name: ONE_HACK_TOO_FAR
description: Trigger an investigation by being traced to a Terminal.

name: TROUBLEMAKER
description: Cause a robot to call for help or reinforcements from a nearby Garrison.

name: SIGNIFICANT_DISRUPTION
description: Raise alert high enough to trigger an assault dispatch.

name: PARTTIME_MECHANIC
description: Repair a part via Repair Station.

name: DYNAMIC_KEY
description: Use an Operator Data Core before it expires.

name: EVERYTHING_IS_UNDER_CONTROL
description: Lower alert using a Terminal's Purge Threat hack.

name: GOHOME
description: Use a Terminal to recall an active squad.

name: SHOPPING_LIST
description: Hack Hauler Manifests at a Terminal.

name: FACTORY_DEFAULTS
description: Reset a hostile robot using the reboot_system hack.

name: ERROR_47
description: Cause a hostile robot's power to go critical with an overload_power or amplify_resonance hack.

name: ASSIMILATION_COMPLETE
description: Assimilate a hostile robot using the format_system hack.

name: TOTAL_SILENCE
description: Jam 10 distress signals or other communications.

name: I_SPY
description: Use an Imp. Sensor Array (or better) with Imp. Signal Interpreter (or better).

name: OMNISCIENT_CARTOGRAPHER
description: Use an Imp. Terrain Scanner (or better) with Imp. Terrain Scan Processor (or better).

name: CANT_CATCH_ME
description: Reach a speed of FASTx3, or 4 spaces per turn.

name: CYA
description: Fly over a row of 3 robots.

name: PERFECT_AIM
description: Have +40% targeting accuracy for ranged weapons via utilities.

name: MORE_DAKKA_PLEASE
description: Fire 10 kinetic projectiles in a single volley.

name: GUNSLINGER
description: Destroy 3 robots with a single volley using secondary targeting.

name: GUN_SPECIALIST
description: Destroy 100 hostiles with at least 90% of damage dealt by guns.

name: CANNON_SPECIALIST
description: Destroy 100 hostiles with at least 90% of damage dealt by cannons.

name: EXPLOSIVE_SPECIALIST
description: Destroy 100 hostiles with at least 90% of damage dealt by launchers.

name: MELEE_SPECIALIST
description: Destroy 100 hostiles with at least 90% of damage dealt by melee weapons.

name: GUERILLA_STYLE
description: Trigger reprogrammed (or placed) traps on 30 hostiles.

name: WHOOSH
description: Move with 4 overloaded hover or flight units.

name: SPEED_DEMON
description: Reach a speed of 10 spaces per turn.

name: SUPERSONIC
description: Reach a speed of 20 spaces per turn.

name: DECODER_RING
description: Obtain 50 pieces of intel from one or more 0b10 Decoder Chips.

name: MAXIMUM_EFFICIENCY
description: Succeed at 10 hacks on a single Terminal.

name: ROOT
description: Succeed at 3 manual hacks on a single Terminal.

name: BELOVED
description: Acquire 75 allies across an entire run.

name: GENERALISSIMO
description: Oversee 75 ally kills across an entire run.

name: WHAT_IS_THIS_THING
description: Discover the use of Self-destruct Interrupters.

name: DECONSTRUCTION
description: Destroy a robot via core entropy.

name: HARD_HITTER
description: Inflict 200 damage against an enemy with one shot from a single weapon.

name: I_THINK_I_KNOW_WHATS_GOING_ON
displayName: I Think I Know What's Going On

name: KILLING_SPREE
description: Achieve a kill streak of 20 hostiles.

name: PREEMPTIVE_STRIKE
description: Destroy a visible ARC before it deploys.

name: LEFTHAND_PATH
description: Destroy all Cetus Guards without any help from allies.

name: STREAKER
description: Enter a main complex map at -5 or above as a naked core, and find an exit (do not have to remain naked).

name: BOLTBATH
description: Achieve a kill streak of 35 hostiles.

name: TORCH
description: Inflict 30,000 thermal damage across an entire run.

name: MAGNETO
description: Inflict 30,000 electromagnetic damage across an entire run.

name: PUNISHER
description: Inflict 30,000 kinetic damage across an entire run.

name: INFILTRATOR
description: Enter and survive 2 Garrisons on a single floor.

name: DESPERATE_TIMES
description: Enter a main complex map at -3 or above as a naked core with no inventory items, and find an exit (do not have to remain naked).

name: MONSTER
description: Kill at least 20 inhabitants of Zion.

name: FEARLESS
description: Enter a Garrison with below 10% core integrity and survive it.

name: SHUTOUT
description: Seal, jam, or destroy all Garrison Access machines in Access.

name: WMD
description: Destroy 100 robots in a single turn.

name: RAMBO
description: Earn 10,000 bonus points for high alert combat kills.
Destroy 4 Network Hubs and escape to the next floor.

name: TRAITOR
description: Personally kill Warlord in his base and escape. Must initiate hostilities before incursion begins.

name: THATS_ONE_DOOR_THAT_SHOULD_STAY_CLOSED
displayName: That's One Door That Should Stay Closed

name: INSPECTOR_GADGET
description: Win while only evolving utility slots.

name: PACIFIST
description: Win without destroying a single robot.

name: TRUE_FLIER
description: Win without attaching any propulsion except flight.

name: MAD_MAX
description: Win with 200 hostiles destroyed and without attaching any propulsion except wheels.

name: HARDCORE
description: Win with 400 hostiles destroyed but no more than 4 utility slots.

name: ONE_LAST_FU
description: Win after entering an Access garrison.

description: Win the Fragile Parts challenge mode.

name: STUNT_WIN
description: Win the Inhibited Evolution challenge mode.

description: Win the No Salvage challenge mode.

name: LIGHT_TRAVELER
description: Win the Pure Core challenge mode.

name: TERMINALS_ARE_FOR_GEEKS
description: Win the Simple Hacker challenge mode.

name: ATTACH_WITH_CARE
description: Win the Sticky Parts challenge mode.

name: BEST_OF_THE_BEST
description: Win the Super Gauntlet challenge mode.
